name: Wave Simulator
description:
A team of 2 guys made this game for Global Game Jam 2017 in one weekend. This game is not finished but if many people will write in comments we will finish this location and gameplay, add more boss fights and maybe even multiplayer.

Use arrows or WASD to turn right and left to collect yellow bonuses and meteorits. Avoid the red triangles and shoot the big boss with yellow spheres.
